casebody.data:
IN RE: David L. BELL NO. 2018-B-0392 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 16, 2018

ORDER

Considering the Petition for Interim Suspension for Threat of Harm filed by the Office of Disciplinary Counsel,

IT IS ORDERED that respondent, David L. Bell, Louisiana Bar Roll number 24020, be and he hereby is suspended from the practice of law on an interim basis pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 19.2, pending further orders of this court. Pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 26(E), this order is effective immediately.

IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the Office of Disciplinary Counsel may seek the appointment of a trustee(s) to protect the interests of respondent's clients pursuant to the provisions of Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 27, if appropriate.

IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the Motion to Seal Exhibit 5 (in globo) filed by the Office of Disciplinary Counsel be and hereby is granted.

NEW ORLEANS, LOUISIANA, this _____ day of ___________________, 2018.

FOR THE COURT:

/s/

JUSTICE, SUPREME COURT OF LOUISIANA
